meanings.definition: Having the most grip or traction.
meanings.sent1: The new tires on the car are the gripiest ones we could find.
meanings.sent2: The monkey's tail is the gripiest part of its body.
meanings.sent3: The gripiest handshake I ever received almost made my hand stuck!
meanings.sent4: Her words had the gripiest hold on my emotions, making me feel every word deeply.
meanings.sent5: The gripiest gloves I own are perfect for climbing steep rocks.

meanings.definition: Showing the most tendency to grip or hold tightly.
meanings.sent1: The gripiest baby in the family never wants to let go of their favorite toy.
meanings.sent2: The gripiest fabric clings to your skin like a second layer.
meanings.sent3: The gripiest cat in the neighborhood always catches the most mice!
meanings.sent4: His eyes had the gripiest stare, making me feel like he could see right through me.
meanings.sent5: The gripiest handshake I ever received almost made my hand stuck!

meanings.definition: Causing the most gripping or holding tightly.
meanings.sent1: The gripiest suspense movie I watched had me on the edge of my seat.
meanings.sent2: The gripiest storybook always keeps the children engaged till the end.
meanings.sent3: The gripiest joke at the party had everyone laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: His words had the gripiest impact on the audience, leaving them speechless.
meanings.sent5: The gripiest roller coaster in the amusement park made my heart race with excitement.
